content.question: A manufacturer of cell phone screens has found that 5 percent of all screens produced have defects. Let <math alttext="p sub d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> represent the population proportion of all cell phone screens with a screen defect, therefore <math alttext="p sub d equals 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. For the sampling distribution of the sample proportion of cell phone screens from this manufacturer with a screen defect for sample size 400, <math alttext="mu sub p hat sub d equals 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is the best interpretation of <math alttext="mu sub p hat sub d equals 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: For a randomly selected cell phone screen from this population, the mean number of screen defects for the selected screen will be equal to 0.05.
For every sample of size 400 from this population, the proportion of cell phone screens with a screen defect will be 0.05.
For all samples of size 400 from this population, the mean number of screen defects for the samples is 0.05.
For all samples of size 400 from this population, the mean of all resulting sample proportions of cell phone screens with a screen defect is 0.05.
For all samples of size 400 from this population, the standard deviation of all resulting sample proportions of cell phone screens with a screen defect is 0.05.

content.answer: For all samples of size 400 from this population, the mean of all resulting sample proportions of cell phone screens with a screen defect is 0.05.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
